To fight source spoofing, one could try to control all access points to the network. But this is in practice very hard to achieve.
contents.zh-CHS: * 只有当攻击者能够获得有效的源地址和目标地址及端口对时，源欺骗才有效，例如通过监听一小部分流量。为了打击源欺骗，可以尝试控制网络的所有接入点。但这在实践中很难实现。

contents.text: An alternative to checking the source address is to encrypt and authenticate the packets, using a secret key that is conveyed during the call set-up procedure. This will not slow down the call set-up, and provides strong protection against address spoofing.
contents.zh-CHS: 检查源地址的另一种方法是使用在呼叫建立过程中传递的密钥对数据包进行加密和身份验证。这不会减慢呼叫设置，并提供强大的地址欺骗保护。

contents.text: 6. Packages
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 包装

contents.text: As described in Section 2.1.6, packages are the preferred way of extending MGCP. In this section we describe the requirements associated with defining a package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第2.1.6节所述，包是扩展MGCP的首选方式。在本节中，我们将描述与定义包相关的需求。

contents.text: A package MUST have a unique package name defined. The package name MUST be registered with the IANA, unless it starts with the characters "x-" or "x+" which are reserved for experimental packages. Please refer to Appendix C for IANA considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: 包必须定义唯一的包名称。包名必须向IANA注册，除非它以字符“x-”或“x+”开头，这是为实验包保留的。请参考附录C了解IANA注意事项。

contents.text: A package MUST also have a version defined which is simply a non-negative integer. The default and initial version of a package is zero, the next version is one, etc. New package versions MUST be completely backwards compatible, i.e., a new version of a package MUST NOT redefine or remove any of the extensions provided in an earlier version of the package. If such a need arises, a new package name MUST be used instead.
contents.zh-CHS: 包还必须定义一个版本，该版本仅为非负整数。包的默认和初始版本为零，下一个版本为一，等等。新的包版本必须完全向后兼容，即包的新版本不得重新定义或删除包的早期版本中提供的任何扩展。如果需要，则必须使用新的包名。

contents.text: Packages containing signals of type time-out MAY indicate if the "to" parameter is supported for all the time-out signals in the package as well as the default rounding rules associated with these (see Section 3.2.2.4). If no such definition is provided, each time-out signal SHOULD provide these definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含超时类型信号的软件包可能表明，软件包中的所有超时信号是否支持“to”参数，以及与这些信号相关的默认舍入规则（见第3.2.2.4节）。如果未提供此类定义，则每个超时信号应提供这些定义。

contents.text: A package defines one or more of the following extensions:
contents.zh-CHS: 包定义以下一个或多个扩展：

contents.text: * Actions
contents.zh-CHS: * 行动

contents.text: * BearerInformation
contents.zh-CHS: * 承载信息

contents.text: * ConnectionModes
contents.zh-CHS: * 连接模式

contents.text: * ConnectionParameters
contents.zh-CHS: * 连接参数

contents.text: * DigitMapLetters
contents.zh-CHS: * 数码相机

contents.text: * Events and Signals
contents.zh-CHS: * 事件和信号

contents.text: * ExtensionParameters
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展参数

contents.text: * LocalConnectionOptions
contents.zh-CHS: * 本地连接选项

contents.text: * ReasonCodes
contents.zh-CHS: * 理由码

contents.text: * RestartMethods
contents.zh-CHS: * 重新启动方法

contents.text: * Return codes
contents.zh-CHS: * 返回码

contents.text: For each of the above types of extensions supported by the package, the package definition MUST contain a description of the extension as defined in the following sections. Please note, that package extensions, just like any other extension, MUST adhere to the MGCP grammar.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于包支持的上述每种类型的扩展，包定义必须包含以下部分中定义的扩展描述。请注意，包扩展与任何其他扩展一样，必须遵守MGCP语法。

contents.text: 6.1 Actions
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1 行动

contents.text: Extension Actions SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展行动应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the extension action.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展操作的名称和编码。

contents.text: * If the extension action takes any action parameters, then the name, encoding, and possible values of those parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果扩展操作采用任何操作参数，则这些参数的名称、编码和可能的值。

contents.text: * A description of the operation of the extension action.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展操作的操作说明。

contents.text: * A listing of the actions in this specification the extension can be combined with. If such a listing is not provided, it is assumed that the extension action cannot be combined with any other action in this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: * 此扩展可与此规范中的操作列表相结合。如果未提供此类列表，则假定扩展操作不能与本规范中的任何其他操作组合。

contents.text: * If more than one extension action is defined in the package, then a listing of the actions in the package the extension can be combined with. If such a listing is not provided, it is assumed that the extension action cannot be combined with any other action in the package.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果在包中定义了多个扩展操作，则可以将扩展与包中的操作列表组合在一起。如果未提供此类列表，则假定扩展操作不能与包中的任何其他操作组合。

contents.text: Extension actions defined in two or more different packages SHOULD NOT be used simultaneously, unless very careful consideration to their potential interaction and side-effects has been given.
contents.zh-CHS: 在两个或多个不同包中定义的扩展操作不应同时使用，除非非常仔细地考虑了它们的潜在交互作用和副作用。

contents.text: 6.2 BearerInformation
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 承载信息

contents.text: BearerInformation extensions SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 信息扩展应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the BearerInformation extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * 承载信息扩展名的名称和编码。

contents.text: * The possible values and encoding of those values that can be assigned to the BearerInformation extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * 可分配给承载信息扩展的可能值和这些值的编码。

contents.text: * A description of the operation of the BearerInformation extension. As part of this description the default value (if any) if the extension is omitted in an EndpointConfiguration command MUST be defined. It may be necessary to make a distinction between the default value before and after the initial application of the parameter, for example if the parameter retains its previous value once specified, until explicitly altered. If default values are not described, then the extension parameter simply defaults to empty in all EndpointConfiguration commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * 轴承信息扩展的操作说明。作为本说明的一部分，如果EndpointConfiguration命令中省略了扩展，则必须定义默认值（如果有）。可能需要在初始应用参数之前和之后对默认值进行区分，例如，如果参数在指定后保留其先前的值，直到显式更改为止。如果未描述默认值，则在所有EndpointConfiguration命令中，扩展参数默认为空。

contents.text: Note that the extension SHALL be included in the result for an AuditEndpoint command auditing the BearerInformation.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，扩展应包含在审核承载信息的AuditEndpoint命令的结果中。

contents.text: 6.3 ConnectionModes
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3 连接模式

contents.text: Extension Connection Modes SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 延伸连接方式应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the extension connection mode.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展连接模式的名称和编码。

contents.text: * A description of the operation of the extension connection mode.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展连接模式的操作说明。

contents.text: * A description of the interaction a connection in the extension connection mode will have with other connections in each of the modes defined in this specification. If such a description is not provided, the extension connection mode MUST NOT have any interaction with other connections on the endpoint.
contents.zh-CHS: * 描述扩展连接模式下的连接与本规范中定义的每个模式下的其他连接之间的交互。如果未提供此类描述，则扩展连接模式不得与端点上的其他连接进行任何交互。

contents.text: Extension connection modes SHALL NOT be included in the list of modes in a response to an AuditEndpoint for Capabilities, since the package will be reported in the list of packages.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展连接模式不应包括在对AuditEndpoint功能的响应的模式列表中，因为包将在包列表中报告。

contents.text: 6.4 ConnectionParameters
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4 连接参数

contents.text: Extension Connection Parameters SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 延伸连接参数应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the connection parameter extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * 连接参数扩展名的名称和编码。

contents.text: * The possible values and encoding of those values that can be assigned to the connection parameter extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * 可以分配给连接参数扩展的可能值和这些值的编码。

contents.text: * A description of how those values are derived.
contents.zh-CHS: * 这些值是如何导出的描述。

contents.text: Note that the extension connection parameter MUST be included in the result for an AuditConnection command auditing the connection parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，对于审核连接参数的AuditConnection命令，结果中必须包含扩展连接参数。

contents.text: 6.5 DigitMapLetters
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5 数码相机

contents.text: Extension Digit Map Letters SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展数字地图字母应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the extension digit map letter(s).
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展数字映射字母的名称和编码。

contents.text: * A description of the meaning of the extension digit map letter(s).
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展数字映射字母含义的说明。

contents.text: Note that extension DigitMapLetters in a digit map do not follow the normal naming conventions for extensions defined in packages. More specifically the package name and slash ("/") will not be part of the extension name, thereby forming a flat and limited name space with potential name clashing.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，数字映射中的扩展digitmapletter不遵循包中定义的扩展的正常命名约定。更具体地说，包名和斜杠（“/”）将不会是扩展名的一部分，从而形成一个平坦、有限的名称空间，可能会产生名称冲突。

contents.text: Therefore, a package SHALL NOT define a digit map letter extension whose encoding has already been used in another package. If two packages have used the same encoding for a digit map letter extension, and those two packages are supported by the same endpoint, the result of using that digit map letter extension is undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，一个包不应定义编码已在另一个包中使用的数字映射字母扩展名。如果两个包对数字映射字母扩展使用了相同的编码，并且这两个包受相同端点的支持，则使用该数字映射字母扩展的结果是未定义的。

contents.text: Note that although an extension DigitMapLetter does not include the package name prefix and slash ("/") as part of the extension name within a digit map, the package name prefix and slash are included when the event code for the event that matched the DigitMapLetter is reported as an observed event. In other words, the digit map just define the matching rule(s), but the event is still reported like any other event.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，尽管扩展DigitMapLetter不包括包名前缀和斜杠（“/”），作为数字映射中扩展名的一部分，但当与DigitMapLetter匹配的事件的事件代码报告为观察到的事件时，会包括包名前缀和斜杠。换句话说，数字映射只定义了匹配规则，但事件仍然像任何其他事件一样报告。

contents.text: 6.6 Events and Signals
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6 事件和信号

contents.text: The event/signal definition SHALL include the precise name of the event/signal (i.e., the code used in MGCP), a plain text definition of the event/signal, and, when appropriate, the precise definition of the corresponding events/signals, for example the exact frequencies of audio signals such as dial tones or DTMF tones.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件/信号定义应包括事件/信号的准确名称（即MGCP中使用的代码）、事件/信号的纯文本定义，以及相应事件/信号的准确定义，如拨号音或DTMF音等音频信号的准确频率。

contents.text: The package description MUST provide, for each event/signal, the following information:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于每个事件/信号，包装说明必须提供以下信息：

contents.text: * The description of the event/signal and its purpose, which SHOULD include the actual signal that is generated by the client (e.g., xx ms FSK tone) as well as the resulting user observed result (e.g., Message Waiting light on/off).
contents.zh-CHS: * 事件/信号及其用途的描述，应包括客户端生成的实际信号（例如xx ms FSK音调）以及由此产生的用户观察结果（例如，消息等待灯打开/关闭）。

contents.text: The event code used for the event/signal.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于事件/信号的事件代码。

contents.text: * The detailed characteristics of the event/signal, such as for example frequencies and amplitude of audio signals, modulations and repetitions. Such details may be country specific.
contents.zh-CHS: * 事件/信号的详细特征，例如音频信号的频率和振幅、调制和重复。这些细节可能因国家而异。

contents.text: * The typical and maximum duration of the event/signal if applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: * 事件/信号的典型和最大持续时间（如适用）。

contents.text: * If the signal or event can be applied to a connection (across a media stream), it MUST be indicated explicitly. If no such indication is provided, it is assumed that the signal or event cannot be applied to a connection.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果信号或事件可应用于连接（通过媒体流），则必须明确指示。如果未提供此类指示，则假定信号或事件无法应用于连接。

contents.text: For events, the following MUST be provided as well:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于活动，还必须提供以下内容：

contents.text: * An indication if the event is persistent. By default, events are not persistent - defining events as being persistent is discouraged (see Appendix B for a preferred alternative). Note that persistent
contents.zh-CHS: * 事件是否持续的指示。默认情况下，事件不是持久性的-不鼓励将事件定义为持久性的（有关首选方案，请参阅附录B）。注意，持久的

contents.text: events will automatically trigger a Notify when they occur, unless the Call Agent explicitly instructed the endpoint otherwise. This not only violates the normal MGCP model, but also assumes the Call Agent supports the package in question. Such an assumption is unlikely to hold in general.
contents.zh-CHS: 事件发生时将自动触发通知，除非调用代理明确指示端点另有指示。这不仅违反了正常的MGCP模型，而且还假设调用代理支持所讨论的包。这种假设不太可能普遍成立。

contents.text: * An indication if there is an auditable event-state associated with the event. By default, events do not have auditable event-states.
contents.zh-CHS: * 指示是否存在与事件关联的可审核事件状态。默认情况下，事件没有可审核的事件状态。

contents.text: * If event parameters are supported, it MUST be stated explicitly. The precise syntax and semantics of these MUST then be provided (subject to the grammar provided in Appendix A). It SHOULD also be specified whether these parameters apply to RequestedEvents, ObservedEvents, DetectEvents and EventStates. If not specified otherwise, it is assumed that:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果支持事件参数，则必须明确说明。然后必须提供准确的语法和语义（以附录A中提供的语法为准）。还应指定这些参数是否适用于RequestedEvents、ObservedEvents、DetectedEvents和EventState。如果未另行规定，则假定：

contents.text: * they do not apply to RequestedEvents,
contents.zh-CHS: * 它们不适用于请求的事件，

contents.text: * they do apply to ObservedEvents,
contents.zh-CHS: * 它们确实适用于观察到的事件，

contents.text: * they apply in the same way to DetectEvents as they do to RequestedEvents for a given event parameter,
contents.zh-CHS: * 它们应用于检测事件的方式与应用于给定事件参数的RequestedEvents的方式相同，

contents.text: * they apply in the same way to EventStates as they do to ObservedEvents for a given event parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: * 它们应用于EventState的方式与应用于给定事件参数的ObservedEvents的方式相同。

contents.text: * If the event is expected to be used in digit map matching, it SHOULD explicitly state so. Note that only events with single letter or digit parameter codes can do this. See Section 2.1.5 for further details.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果该事件预期用于数字映射匹配，则应明确说明。请注意，只有具有单字母或数字参数代码的事件才能执行此操作。详见第2.1.5节。

contents.text: For signals, the following MUST be provided as well:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于信号，还必须提供以下内容：

contents.text: * The type of signal (OO, TO, BR).
contents.zh-CHS: * 信号类型（OO、TO、BR）。

contents.text: * Time-Out signals SHOULD have an indication of the default time-out value. In some cases, time-out values may be variable (if dependent on some action to complete such as out-pulsing digits).
contents.zh-CHS: * 超时信号应具有默认超时值的指示。在某些情况下，超时值可能是可变的（如果取决于要完成的某些操作，如输出脉冲数字）。

contents.text: * If signal parameters are supported, it MUST be stated explicitly. The precise syntax and semantics of these MUST then be provided (subject to the grammar provided in Appendix A).
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果支持信号参数，则必须明确说明。然后必须提供准确的语法和语义（以附录A中提供的语法为准）。

contents.text: * Time-Out signals may also indicate whether the "to" parameter is supported or not as well as what the rounding rules associated with them are. If omitted from the signal definition, the package-wide definition is assumed (see Section 6). If the package definition did not specify this, rounding rules default to the nearest non-
contents.zh-CHS: * 超时信号还可以指示是否支持“to”参数以及与之相关的舍入规则。如果从信号定义中省略，则假定为封装范围的定义（见第6节）。如果包定义未指定此项，则舍入规则默认为最接近的非整数-

contents.text: zero second, whereas support for the "to" parameter defaults to "no" for package version zero, and "yes" for package versions one and higher.
contents.zh-CHS: 零秒，而对于包版本0，对“to”参数的支持默认为“no”，对于包版本1及更高版本，支持“yes”。

contents.text: The following format is RECOMMENDED for defining events and signals in conformance with the above:
contents.zh-CHS: 建议使用以下格式定义符合上述要求的事件和信号：

contents.text: where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: * Symbol indicates the event code used for the event/signal, e.g., "hd".
contents.zh-CHS: * 符号表示用于事件/信号的事件代码，例如“hd”。

contents.text: * Definition gives a brief definition of the event/signal
contents.zh-CHS: * 定义给出了事件/信号的简要定义

contents.text: * R contains an "x" if the event can be detected or one or more of the following symbols:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果可以检测到事件或以下一个或多个符号，则R包含一个“x”：

contents.text: - "P" if the event is persistent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果事件持续发生，则为“P”。

contents.text: - "S" if the events is an event-state that may be audited.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果事件是可审核的事件状态，则为“S”。

contents.text: - "C" if the event can be detected on a connection.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果可以在连接上检测到事件，则为“C”。

contents.text: * S contains one of the following if it is a signal:
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果是信号，则S包含以下内容之一：

contents.text: - "OO" if the signal is On/Off signal.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果信号为开/关信号，则为“OO”。

contents.text: - "TO" if the signal is a Time-Out signal.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果信号是超时信号，则为“至”。

contents.text: - "BR" if the signal is a Brief signal.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果信号为短信号，则为“BR”。

contents.text: * S also contains:
contents.zh-CHS: * S还包括：

contents.text: - "C" if the signal can be applied on a connection.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果信号可应用于连接，则为“C”。

contents.text: The table SHOULD then be followed by a more comprehensive description of each event/signal defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，应在表格后面对定义的每个事件/信号进行更全面的描述。

contents.text: 6.6.1 Default and Reserved Events
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.1 默认和保留事件

contents.text: All packages that contain Time-Out type signals contain the operation failure ("of") and operation complete ("oc") events, irrespective of whether they are provided as part of the package description or not. These events are needed to support Time-Out signals and cannot be overridden in packages with Time-Out signals. They MAY be extended if necessary, however such practice is discouraged.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有包含超时类型信号的软件包都包含操作失败（“of”）和操作完成（“oc”）事件，无论它们是否作为软件包说明的一部分提供。这些事件是支持超时信号所必需的，不能在带有超时信号的包中被重写。如有必要，可予以延长，但不鼓励这种做法。

contents.text: If a package without Time-Out signals does contain definitions for the "oc" and "of" events, the event definitions provided in the package MAY over-ride those indicated here. Such practice is however discouraged and is purely allowed to avoid potential backwards compatibility problems.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有超时信号的程序包包含“oc”和“of”事件的定义，则程序包中提供的事件定义可能超过此处所示的定义。然而，这种做法是不鼓励的，纯粹是为了避免潜在的向后兼容性问题。

contents.text: It is considered good practice to explicitly mention that the two events are supported in accordance with their default definitions, which are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 明确提及这两个事件是根据其默认定义支持的，这被视为良好实践，如下所示：

contents.text: Operation complete (oc): The operation complete event is generated when the gateway was asked to apply one or several signals of type TO on the endpoint or connection, and one or more of those signals completed without being stopped by the detection of a requested event such as off-hook transition or dialed digit. The completion report should carry as a parameter the name of the signal that came to the end of its live time, as in:
contents.zh-CHS: Operation complete（oc）：当要求网关在端点或连接上应用一个或多个类型的信号时，会生成Operation complete事件，并且这些信号中的一个或多个已完成，而不会因检测到请求的事件（如摘机转换或拨号数字）而停止。完工报告应将到达现场时间结束的信号名称作为参数，如：

contents.text: O: G/oc(G/rt)
In this case, the observed event occurred because the "rt" signal in the "G" package timed out.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，发生观察到的事件是因为“G”包中的“rt”信号超时。

contents.text: If the reported signal was applied on a connection, the parameter supplied will include the name of the connection as well, as in:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果报告的信号应用于连接，则提供的参数也将包括连接的名称，如：

contents.text: O: G/oc(G/rt@0A3F58)

When the operation complete event is requested, it cannot be parameterized with any event parameters. When the package name is omitted (which is discouraged) as part of the signal name, the default package is assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求操作完成事件时，不能使用任何事件参数对其进行参数化。当包名作为信号名的一部分被省略（不鼓励使用）时，将采用默认包。

contents.text: Operation failure (of): The operation failure event is generated when the endpoint was asked to apply one or several signals of type TO on the endpoint or connection, and one or more of those signals failed prior to timing out. The completion report should carry as a parameter the name of the signal that failed, as in:
contents.zh-CHS: 操作失败（of）：当要求端点将一个或多个类型的信号应用于端点或连接上，并且其中一个或多个信号在超时之前失败时，将生成操作失败事件。完成报告应包含失败信号的名称作为参数，如：

contents.text: O: G/of(G/rt)
In this case a failure occurred in producing the "rt" signal in the "G" package.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，在“G”包中产生“rt”信号时发生故障。

contents.text: When the reported signal was applied on a connection, the parameter supplied will include the name of the connection as well, as in:
contents.zh-CHS: 当报告的信号应用于连接时，提供的参数也将包括连接的名称，如：

contents.text: O: G/of(G/rt@0A3F58)
When the operation failure event is requested, event parameters can not be specified. When the package name is omitted (which is discouraged), the default package name is assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求操作失败事件时，无法指定事件参数。如果省略包名（不鼓励使用），则假定默认包名。

contents.text: 6.7 ExtensionParameters
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7 扩展参数

contents.text: Extension parameter extensions SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展参数扩展应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the extension parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展参数的名称和编码。

contents.text: * The possible values and encoding of those values that can be assigned to the extension parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: * 可分配给扩展参数的值的可能值和编码。

contents.text: * For each of the commands defined in this specification, whether the extension parameter is Mandatory, Optional, or Forbidden in requests as well as responses. Note that extension parameters SHOULD NOT normally be mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: * 对于本规范中定义的每个命令，扩展参数在请求和响应中是必需的、可选的还是禁止的。请注意，扩展参数通常不应是强制性的。

contents.text: * A description of the operation of the extension parameter. As part of this description the default value (if any) if the extension is omitted in a command MUST be defined. It may be necessary to make a distinction between the default value before and after the initial application of the parameter, for example if the parameter retains its previous value once specified, until explicitly altered. If default values are not described, then the extension parameter simply defaults to empty in all commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展参数操作的说明。作为本说明的一部分，如果在命令中省略了扩展名，则必须定义默认值（如果有）。可能需要在初始应用参数之前和之后对默认值进行区分，例如，如果参数在指定后保留其先前的值，直到显式更改为止。如果没有描述默认值，那么扩展参数在所有命令中都默认为空。

contents.text: * Whether the extension can be audited in AuditEndpoint and/or AuditConnection as well as the values returned. If nothing is specified, then auditing of the extension parameter can only be done for AuditEndpoint, and the value returned SHALL be the current value for the extension. Note that this may be empty.
contents.zh-CHS: * 是否可以在AuditEndpoint和/或AuditConnection中审核扩展以及返回的值。如果未指定任何内容，则只能对AuditEndpoint执行扩展参数的审核，返回的值应为扩展的当前值。请注意，这可能是空的。

contents.text: 6.8 LocalConnectionOptions
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8 本地连接选项

contents.text: LocalConnectionOptions extensions SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 本地连接选项扩展应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding of the LocalConnectionOptions extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * LocalConnectionOptions扩展的名称和编码。

contents.text: * The possible values and encoding of those values that can be assigned to the LocalConnectionOptions extension.
contents.zh-CHS: * 可以分配给LocalConnectionOptions扩展的可能值和这些值的编码。

contents.text: * A description of the operation of the LocalConnectionOptions extension. As part of this description the following MUST be specified:
contents.zh-CHS: * LocalConnectionOptions扩展的操作说明。作为本说明的一部分，必须指定以下内容：

contents.text: - The default value (if any) if the extension is omitted in a CreateConnection command.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果CreateConnection命令中省略了扩展名，则为默认值（如果有）。

contents.text: - The default value if omitted in a ModifyConnection command. This may be to simply retain the previous value (if any) or to apply the default value. If nothing is specified, the current value is retained if possible.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果在ModifyConnection命令中省略，则为默认值。这可能只是保留以前的值（如果有）或应用默认值。如果未指定任何内容，则尽可能保留当前值。

contents.text: - If Auditing of capabilities will result in the extension being returned, then a description to that effect as well as with what possible values and their encoding (note that the package itself will always be returned). If nothing is specified, the extension SHALL NOT be returned when auditing capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果对功能的审核将导致返回扩展名，那么将给出相应的描述以及可能的值及其编码（请注意，包本身将始终返回）。如果未指定任何内容，则在审核功能时不应返回扩展。

contents.text: Also note, that the extension MUST be included in the result for an AuditConnection command auditing the LocalConnectionOptions.
contents.zh-CHS: 还要注意，对于审核LocalConnectionOptions的AuditConnection命令，扩展必须包含在结果中。

contents.text: 6.9 Reason Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9 原因码

contents.text: Extension reason codes SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展原因代码应包括：

contents.text: * The number for the reason code. The number MUST be in the range 800 to 899.
contents.zh-CHS: * 原因代码的编号。数字必须在800到899之间。

contents.text: * A description of the extension reason code including the circumstances that leads to the generation of the reason code. Those circumstances SHOULD be limited to events caused by another extension defined in the package to ensure the recipient will be able to interpret the extension reason code correctly.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展原因代码的说明，包括导致生成原因代码的情况。这些情况应限于由包中定义的另一个扩展导致的事件，以确保收件人能够正确解释扩展原因代码。

contents.text: Note that the extension reason code may have to be provided in the result for an AuditEndpoint command auditing the reason code.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，可能必须在审核原因代码的AuditEndpoint命令的结果中提供扩展原因代码。

contents.text: 6.10 RestartMethods
contents.zh-CHS: 6.10 重新启动方法

contents.text: Extension Restart Methods SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展重启方法应包括：

contents.text: * The name and encoding for the restart method.
contents.zh-CHS: * 重新启动方法的名称和编码。

contents.text: * A description of the restart method including the circumstances that leads to the generation of the restart method. Those circumstances SHOULD be limited to events caused by another extension defined in the package to ensure the recipient will be able to interpret the extension restart method correctly.
contents.zh-CHS: * 重新启动方法的说明，包括导致生成重新启动方法的情况。这些情况应限于由包中定义的另一个扩展引起的事件，以确保收件人能够正确解释扩展重新启动方法。

contents.text: * An indication of whether the RestartDelay parameter is to be used with the extension. If nothing is specified, it is assumed that it is not to be used. In that case, RestartDelay MUST be ignored if present.
contents.zh-CHS: * 指示RestartDelay参数是否与扩展一起使用。如果未指定任何内容，则假定不使用。在这种情况下，如果存在RestartDelay，则必须忽略它。

contents.text: * If the restart method defines a service state, the description MUST explicitly state and describe this. In that case, the extension restart method can then be provided in the result for an AuditEndpoint command auditing the restart method.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果restart方法定义了服务状态，那么说明必须显式地说明和描述该状态。在这种情况下，可以在审计重启方法的AuditEndpoint命令的结果中提供扩展重启方法。

contents.text: 6.11 Return Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 6.11 返回码

contents.text: Extension Return Codes SHALL include:
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展返回代码应包括：

contents.text: * The number for the extension return code. The number MUST be in the range 800 to 899.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展返回代码的编号。数字必须在800到899之间。

contents.text: * A description of the extension return code including the circumstances that leads to the generation of the extension return code. Those circumstances SHOULD be limited to events caused by another extension defined in the package to ensure the recipient will be able to interpret the extension return code correctly.
contents.zh-CHS: * 扩展返回码的描述，包括导致生成扩展返回码的情况。这些情况应限于由包中定义的另一个扩展引起的事件，以确保收件人能够正确解释扩展返回代码。

contents.text: 7. Versions and Compatibility
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 版本和兼容性

contents.text: 7.1 Changes from RFC 2705
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1 RFC 2705的变更

contents.text: RFC 2705 was issued in October 1999, as the last update of draft version 0.5. This updated document benefits from further implementation experience. The main changes from RFC 2705 are:
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 2705于1999年10月发布，作为0.5版草案的最后一次更新。本更新文件得益于进一步的实施经验。RFC 2705的主要变化是：

contents.text: * Contains several clarifications, editorial changes and resolution of known inconsistencies.
contents.zh-CHS: * 包含若干澄清、编辑更改和已知不一致的解决方案。

contents.text: * Firmed up specification language in accordance with RFC 2119 and added RFC 2119 conventions section.
contents.zh-CHS: * 根据RFC 2119确定了规范语言，并增加了RFC 2119惯例部分。

contents.text: * Clarified behavior of mixed wild-carding in endpoint names.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了端点名称中的混合野生梳理行为。

contents.text: * Deleted naming requirement about having first term identify the physical gateway when the gateway consists of multiple physical gateways. Also added recommendations on wild-carding naming usage from the right only, as well as mixed wildcard usage.
contents.zh-CHS: * 删除了当网关由多个物理网关组成时，有关让第一个术语标识物理网关的命名要求。还添加了关于仅从右侧使用通配符以及混合通配符的建议。

contents.text: * Clarified that synonymous forms and values for endpoint names are not freely interchangeable.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明端点名称的同义形式和值不能自由互换。

contents.text: * Allowed IPv6 addresses in endpoint names.
contents.zh-CHS: * 端点名称中允许的IPv6地址。

contents.text: * Clarified Digit Map matching rules.
contents.zh-CHS: * 澄清了数字地图匹配规则。

contents.text: * Added missing semantics for symbols used in digit maps.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为数字地图中使用的符号添加了缺少的语义。

contents.text: * Added Timer T description in Digit Maps.
contents.zh-CHS: * 在数字地图中添加了计时器T说明。

contents.text: * Added recommendation to support digit map sizes of at least 2048 bytes per endpoint.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了支持每个端点至少2048字节的数字映射大小的建议。

contents.text: * Clarified use of wildcards in several commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了在几个命令中使用通配符。

contents.text: * Event and Signal Parameters formally defined for events and signals.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为事件和信号正式定义的事件和信号参数。

contents.text: * Persistent events now allowed in base MGCP protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: * 基本MGCP协议中现在允许持久事件。

contents.text: * Added additional detail on connection wildcards.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了有关连接通配符的其他详细信息。

contents.text: * Clarified behavior of loopback, and continuity test connection modes for mixing and multiple connections in those modes.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了环回的行为，以及在这些模式下混合和多个连接的连续性测试连接模式。

contents.text: * Modified BearerInformation to be conditional optional in the EndpointConfiguration command.
contents.zh-CHS: * 在EndpointConfiguration命令中将BearerInformation修改为条件可选。

contents.text: * Clarified "swap audio" action operation for one specific scenario and noted that operation for other scenarios is undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: * 澄清了一个特定场景的“交换音频”操作，并指出其他场景的操作未定义。

contents.text: * Added recommendation that all implementations support PCMU encoding for interoperability.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了所有实现都支持PCMU编码以实现互操作性的建议。

contents.text: * Changed Bandwidth LocalConnectionOptions value from excluding to including overhead from the IP layer and up for consistency with SDP.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为了与SDP保持一致，已将带宽LocalConnectionOptions值从排除更改为包括IP层的开销。

contents.text: * Clarified that mode of second connection in a CreateConnection command will be set to "send/receive".
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明CreateConnection命令中的第二个连接模式将设置为“发送/接收”。

contents.text: * Type of service default changed to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: * 服务默认类型更改为零。

contents.text: * Additional detail on echo cancellation, silence suppression, and gain control. Also added recommendation for Call Agents not to specify handling of echo cancellation and gain control.
contents.zh-CHS: * 关于回声消除、静音抑制和增益控制的更多详细信息。还增加了建议呼叫代理不要指定回声消除和增益控制的处理。

contents.text: * Added requirement for a connection to have a RemoteConnectionDescriptor in order to use the "network loopback" and "network continuity test" modes.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为了使用“网络环回”和“网络连续性测试”模式，增加了对连接使用RemoteConnectionDescriptor的要求。

contents.text: * Removed procedures and specification for NAS's (will be provided as package instead).
contents.zh-CHS: * 删除了NAS的程序和规范（将作为软件包提供）。

contents.text: * Removed procedures and specification for ATM (will be provided as package instead).
contents.zh-CHS: * 删除ATM的程序和规范（将作为包装提供）。

contents.text: * Added missing optional NotifiedEntity parameter to the DeleteConnection (from the Call Agent) MGCI command.
contents.zh-CHS: * 将缺少的可选NotifiedEntity参数添加到DeleteConnection（从调用代理）MGCI命令中。

contents.text: * Added optional new MaxMGCPDatagram RequestedInfo code for AuditEndpoint to enable auditing of maximum size of MGCP datagrams supported.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为AuditEndpoint添加可选的新MaxMGCPDatagram RequestedInfo代码，以支持对所支持的最大MGCP数据报大小进行审核。

contents.text: * Added optional new PackageList RequestedInfo code for AuditEndpoint to enable auditing of packages with a package version number. PackageList parameter also allowed with return code 518 (unsupported package).
contents.zh-CHS: * 为AuditEndpoint添加了可选的新PackageList RequestedInfo代码，以启用对具有包版本号的包的审核。还允许使用PackageList参数，返回代码为518（不支持的包）。

contents.text: * Added missing attributes in Capabilities.
contents.zh-CHS: * 在功能中添加了缺少的属性。

contents.text: * Clarified that at the expiration of a non-zero restart delay, an updated RestartInProgress should be sent. Also clarified that a new NotifiedEntity can only be returned in response to a RestartInProgress command.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明在非零重启延迟到期时，应发送更新的重启进度。还阐明了新的NotifiedEntity只能在响应RestartInProgress命令时返回。

contents.text: * Added Response Acknowledgement response (return code 000) and included in three-way handshake.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了响应确认响应（返回代码000）并包含在三向握手中。

contents.text: * ResponseAck parameter changed to be allowed in all commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * responseak参数已更改为允许在所有命令中使用。

contents.text: * Added return codes 101, 405, 406, 407, 409, 410, 503, 504, 505, 506, 507, 508, 509, 533, 534, 535, 536, 537, 538, 539, 540, 541, and defined return codes in range 800-899 to be package specific return codes. Additional text provided for some return codes and additional detail on how to handle unknown return codes added.
* Added reason code 903, 904, 905 and defined reason codes 800-899 to be package specific reason codes.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加原因代码903、904、905，并将定义的原因代码800-899作为机组特定的原因代码。

contents.text: * Added section clarifying codec negotiation procedure.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了一节，澄清编解码器协商过程。

contents.text: * Clarified that resource reservation parameters in a ModifyConnection command defaults to the current value used.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明ModifyConnection命令中的资源保留参数默认为使用的当前值。

contents.text: * Clarified that connection mode is optional in ModifyConnection commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了连接模式在ModifyConnection命令中是可选的。

contents.text: * Corrected LocalConnectionDescriptor to be optional in response to CreateConnection commands (in case of failure).
contents.zh-CHS: * 已更正LocalConnectionDescriptor为可选的，以响应CreateConnection命令（在失败的情况下）。

contents.text: * Clarified that quoted-strings are UTF-8 encoded and interchangeability of quoted strings and unquoted strings.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了带引号的字符串是UTF-8编码的，并说明了带引号的字符串和不带引号的字符串的互换性。

contents.text: * Clarified that Transaction Identifiers are compared as numerical values.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明将事务标识符作为数值进行比较。

contents.text: * Clarified bit-ordering for Type Of Service LocalConnectionOptions.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了服务类型LocalConnectionOptions的位顺序。

contents.text: * Clarified the use of RequestIdentifier zero.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了RequestIdentifier零的用法。

contents.text: * Added example sections for commands, responses, and some call flows.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了命令、响应和一些调用流的示例部分。

contents.text: * Corrected usage of and requirements for SDP to be strictly RFC 2327 compliant.
contents.zh-CHS: * SDP的正确使用和要求严格符合RFC 2327。

contents.text: * Added requirement that all MGCP implementations must support MGCP datagrams up to at least 4000 bytes. Also added new section on Maximum Datagram Size, Fragmentation and reassembly.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了所有MGCP实现必须支持至少4000字节的MGCP数据报的要求。还增加了关于最大数据报大小、碎片和重组的新章节。

contents.text: * Generalized piggybacking retransmission scheme to only state underlying requirements to be satisfied.
contents.zh-CHS: * 广义背驮重传方案，仅说明要满足的基本要求。

contents.text: * Clarified the section on computing retransmission timers.
contents.zh-CHS: * 澄清了有关计算重传计时器的部分。

contents.text: * Clarified operation of long-running transactions, including provisional responses, retransmissions and failures.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了长期运行事务的操作，包括临时响应、重新传输和故障。

contents.text: * Enhanced description of provisional responses and interaction with three-way handshake.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增强了对临时响应和三方握手交互的描述。

contents.text: * Enhanced description of fail-over and the role of "notified entity". An empty "notified entity" has been allowed, although strongly discouraged.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增强了对故障转移和“通知实体”角色的描述。允许使用空的“通知实体”，但强烈建议不要使用。

contents.text: * Clarified retransmission procedure and removed "wrong key" considerations from it. Also fixed inconsistencies between Max1 and Max2 retransmission boundaries and the associated flow diagram.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了重新传输过程，并从中删除了“错误密钥”的考虑因素。还修复了Max1和Max2重传边界和相关流程图之间的不一致。

contents.text: * Updated domain name resolution for retransmission procedure to incur less overhead when multiple endpoints are retransmitting.
contents.zh-CHS: * 更新了重新传输过程的域名解析，以在多个端点重新传输时减少开销。

contents.text: * Removed requirement for in-order delivery of NotificationRequests response and Notify commands. Notify commands are still delivered in-order.
contents.zh-CHS: * 删除了顺序传递NotificationRequests响应和Notify命令的要求。通知命令仍按顺序传递。

contents.text: * Clarified that activating an embedded Notification Request does not clear the list of ObservedEvents.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明激活嵌入式通知请求不会清除观察到的事件列表。

contents.text: * Defined interactions between disconnected state and notification state.
contents.zh-CHS: * 已定义断开连接状态和通知状态之间的交互。

contents.text: * Added section on transactional semantics.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了关于事务语义的部分。

contents.text: * Defined gateway behavior when multiple interacting transactions are received.
contents.zh-CHS: * 收到多个交互事务时定义的网关行为。

contents.text: * Additional details provided on service states. Clarified relationship between endpoint service states, restart methods, and associated processing of commands.
contents.zh-CHS: * 提供了有关服务状态的其他详细信息。阐明了端点服务状态、重启方法和相关命令处理之间的关系。

contents.text: * Clarified operation for transitioning from "restart procedure" to "disconnected state".
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了从“重启程序”过渡到“断开状态”的操作。

contents.text: * Allowed auditing commands and responses to bypass the "restart" and "disconnected" procedures.
contents.zh-CHS: * 允许审核命令和响应绕过“重新启动”和“断开连接”过程。

contents.text: * Clarified operation of "disconnected procedure" and in particular the operation of piggy-backed "disconnected" RestartInProgress messages.
contents.zh-CHS: * 阐明了“断开连接程序”的操作，特别是清管式“断开连接”重启进程消息的操作。

contents.text: * Added option to aggregate "disconnected" RestartInProgress messages under certain conditions to reduce message volume.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了在特定条件下聚合“断开连接的”重新启动消息以减少消息量的选项。

contents.text: * Defined additional behavior for endpoints wishing to send commands while in the "disconnected" state.
contents.zh-CHS: * 为希望在“断开连接”状态下发送命令的端点定义了其他行为。

contents.text: * Added new section on Load Control in General which includes two new error codes (101 and 409) to handle overload.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了关于负载控制的新章节，其中包括处理过载的两个新错误代码（101和409）。

contents.text: * Deleted the "Proposed MoveConnection command".
contents.zh-CHS: * 删除了“建议的移动连接命令”。

contents.text: * Removed packages from protocol specification (will be provided in separate documents instead).
contents.zh-CHS: * 从协议规范中删除包（将在单独的文件中提供）。

contents.text: * Package concept formally extended to be primary extension mechanism now allowing extensions for the following to be defined in packages as well:
contents.zh-CHS: * 包概念正式扩展为主要扩展机制，现在允许在包中定义以下扩展：

contents.text: - BearerInformation
contents.zh-CHS: - 承载信息

contents.text: - LocalConnectionOptions
contents.zh-CHS: - 本地连接选项

contents.text: - ExtensionParameters
contents.zh-CHS: - 扩展参数

contents.text: - Connection Modes
contents.zh-CHS: - 连接方式

contents.text: - Actions
contents.zh-CHS: - 行动

contents.text: - Digit Map Letters
contents.zh-CHS: - 数字地图字母

contents.text: - Connection Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: - 连接参数

contents.text: - Restart Methods
contents.zh-CHS: - 重启方法

contents.text: - Reason Codes
contents.zh-CHS: - 原因码

contents.text: - Return Codes
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回码

contents.text: * Requirements and suggested format for package definitions added.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了包装定义的要求和建议格式。

contents.text: * Defined "operation complete" and "operation failure" events to be automatically present in packages with Time-Out signals.
contents.zh-CHS: * 定义的“操作完成”和“操作失败”事件将自动出现在带有超时信号的包中。

contents.text: * Deleted list of differences that were prior to RFC 2705.
contents.zh-CHS: * 已删除RFC 2705之前的差异列表。

contents.text: * Added Base Package to deal with quarantine buffer overflow, ObservedEvents overflow, embedded NotificationRequest failure, and to enable events to be requested persistently. A new "Message" command is included as well.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了基本包以处理隔离缓冲区溢出、ObservedEvents溢出、嵌入式NotificationRequest失败，并支持持久请求事件。还包括一个新的“消息”命令。

contents.text: * IANA registration procedures for packages and other extensions added.
contents.zh-CHS: * 增加了包和其他扩展的IANA注册程序。

contents.text: * Updated grammar to fix known errors and support new extensions in a backwards compatible manner. Added new (optional) PackageList and MaxMGCPDatagram for auditing. Changed explicit white space rules in some productions to make grammar more consistent.
contents.zh-CHS: * 更新语法以修复已知错误并以向后兼容的方式支持新扩展。添加了用于审核的新（可选）PackageList和MaxMGCPDatagram。更改了某些产品中的显式空白规则，以使语法更加一致。

contents.text: * Connection Mode interaction table added.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了连接模式交互表。

contents.text: * Added additional detail on virtual endpoint naming conventions. Also added suggested gateway endpoint convention and a "Range Wildcard" option to the Endpoint Naming Conventions.
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加了有关虚拟端点命名约定的其他详细信息。还向端点命名约定添加了建议的网关端点约定和“范围通配符”选项。

contents.text: 8. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 安全考虑

contents.text: Security issues are discussed in section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 第5节讨论了安全问题。

contents.text: 9. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 致谢

contents.text: Special thanks are due to the authors of the original MGCP 1.0 specification: Mauricio Arango, Andrew Dugan, Isaac Elliott, Christian Huitema, and Scott Picket.
contents.zh-CHS: 特别感谢原始MGCP 1.0规范的作者：Mauricio Arango、Andrew Dugan、Isaac Elliott、Christian Huitema和Scott Picket。

contents.text: We also want to thank the many reviewers who provided advice on the design of SGCP and then MGCP, notably Sankar Ardhanari, Francois Berard, David Auerbach, Bob Biskner, David Bukovinsky, Charles Eckel, Mario Edini, Ed Guy, Barry Hoffner, Jerry Kamitses, Oren Kudevitzki, Rajesh Kumar, Troy Morley, Dave Oran, Jeff Orwick, John Pickens, Lou Rubin, Chip Sharp, Paul Sijben, Kurt Steinbrenner, Joe Stone, and Stuart Wray.
contents.zh-CHS: 我们还要感谢为SGCP和MGCP的设计提供建议的众多评论家，特别是桑卡尔·阿尔达纳里、弗朗索瓦·贝拉德、大卫·奥尔巴赫、鲍勃·比斯克纳、大卫·布科文斯基、查尔斯·埃克尔、马里奥·埃迪尼、埃德·盖伊、巴里·霍夫纳、杰里·卡米特斯、奥伦·库德维茨基、拉杰什·库马尔、特洛伊·莫利、大卫·奥兰、杰夫·奥维克、约翰·皮肯斯、卢·鲁宾，奇普·夏普、保罗·西杰本、库尔特·斯坦布雷纳、乔·斯通和斯图亚特·瑞。

contents.text: The version 0.1 of MGCP was heavily inspired by the "Internet Protocol Device Control" (IPDC) designed by the Technical Advisory Committee set up by Level 3 Communications. Whole sets of text were retrieved from the IP Connection Control protocol, IP Media Control protocol, and IP Device Management. The authors wish to acknowledge the contribution to these protocols made by Ilya Akramovich, Bob Bell, Dan Brendes, Peter Chung, John Clark, Russ Dehlinger, Andrew Dugan, Isaac Elliott, Cary FitzGerald, Jan Gronski, Tom Hess, Geoff Jordan, Tony Lam, Shawn Lewis, Dave Mazik, Alan Mikhak, Pete O'Connell, Scott Pickett, Shyamal Prasad, Eric Presworsky, Paul Richards, Dale Skran, Louise Spergel, David Sprague, Raj Srinivasan, Tom Taylor and Michael Thomas.
contents.zh-CHS: MGCP的0.1版深受3级通信公司成立的技术咨询委员会设计的“互联网协议设备控制”（IPDC）的启发。从IP连接控制协议、IP媒体控制协议和IP设备管理中检索整套文本。作者希望感谢Ilya Akramovich、Bob Bell、Dan Brendes、Peter Chung、John Clark、Russ Dehlinger、Andrew Dugan、Isaac Elliott、Cary FitzGerald、Jan Gronski、Tom Hess、Geoff Jordan、Tony Lam、Shawn Lewis、Dave Mazik、Alan Mikhak、Pete O'Connell、Scott Pickett、Shymal Prasad、，Eric Presworsky、Paul Richards、Dale Skran、Louise Spergel、David Sprague、Raj Srinivasan、Tom Taylor和Michael Thomas。
